player

Class Dealer

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.Player
      • player.Dealer

  • public class Dealer
extends Player
    The Dealer Class inherits from Player. It handles all the logic required for the dealer's decision to hit or stand. The dealer will hit if their total is 16 or less or on a soft 17 (an A and 6); the Dealer stands otherwise.
    Author:
    RossWeinstein

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dealer()
      Constructs a Dealer ready to deal some blackjack

    • Method Detail

      • dealerHits

        public boolean dealerHits()
        Determines if the dealer is able to hit or not
        Returns:
        if the Dealer's hand is less than 17 or a soft 17, the dealer must hit so return true; false otherwise

      • showHandTotal

        public java.lang.String showHandTotal()
        Returns the Dealer's blackjack hand total
        Specified by:
        showHandTotal in class Player
        Returns:
        String the Dealer's Hand total with 'Dealer Total' title

      • showHand

        public java.lang.String showHand()
        Returns each card in the Dealer's hand
        Overrides:
        showHand in class Player
        Returns:
        String the Dealer's Hand in sequence with 'Dealer Hand' title

      • openingHand

        public java.lang.String openingHand()
        Print only the Dealer's second card to screen
        Returns:
        String until it is the Gambler's turn, we cannot show both of the Dealer's card. This only returns the Dealer's second card where the first card is only printed as 'X'
